features.name: World Map

original.notes: earthmap.cpp (50K) handles core map rendering. mapmanage.cpp (52K) manages map state, projections, overlays. Multiple projection types available.

next.notes: Single MapWidget handles azimuthal projection, day/night terminator with NASA Black Marble night lights, great circles, and NASA Blue Marble backgrounds. Missing: Robinson projection, Mercator, full overlay system.

Great circle path from DE to DX
features.notes:
MapWidget enhanced with Phase 4 Interactive Map Enhancements:
- **Tooltips**: Priority-based hit-testing for DE/DX markers, sun, satellite, DX cluster spots with auto-positioning and 3s fade-out.
- **Mouse Motion**: Integrated onMouseMove() for real-time cursor tracking and tooltip updates.
- **Enriched Debug Data**: getDebugData() now reports DE/DX positions, distance/bearing, sun position, satellite info, spot counts, and current tooltip.
- **API Endpoints**: Added GET /get_dx.txt (DX location + distance/bearing) and GET /set_mappos (programmatic DE/DX setting).
- **Helper Functions**: screenToLatLon() inverse projection for reusable coordinate conversion.
- **FontManager Integration**: Tooltips rendered with proper font scaling.

Phase 26: High-Fidelity Map Visuals:
- **Night Lights**: Integrated NASA Black Marble 卫星 imagery for realistic city lights at night.
- **Grid Mesh Rendering**: Shifted to hardware-accelerated triangle strips for smoother transitions and projection accuracy.

Remaining items for future phases:
- Robinson projection
- Mercator projection
- Full grid overlay system (Maidenhead/lat-lon toggle)
- City markers
- Additional semantic actions (zoom, projection switching)

features.notes:
WebServer enhanced with Phase 4 API endpoints:
- **GET /get_dx.txt**: Reports DX grid, lat/lon, distance (km), and bearing (degrees).
- **GET /set_mappos?lat=F&lon=F&target=de|dx**: Programmatically sets DE or DX location on the map, returns JSON with computed Maidenhead grid.

All acceptance criteria met. Full API documented in API.md.
